modName: Tel Sadrith - Telvanni tower player home
summary: Adds a Telvanni tower player home to the Skyrim mainland. Good for roleplaying as a Telvanni wizard or a mushroom addict.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DRAGONBORN!
Made using Earrindo's excellent Telvanni tower resource: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34882//?
Thanks to Ac3s for letting me use his edited meshes!

Telvanni Reborn textures are highly recommended:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34601//?

Tel Sadrith is a Telvanni style huge-ass mushroom that serves as a player home. It is smaller than Tel Mithryn, but still pretty impressive for a mushroom. It is mostly lore friendly. I hope.

The large tower has a bed, bookshelves, chests, enchanting table and a staff enchanter. A bunch of wizard stuff, basically.
All containers are non-respawning. In fact, only some barrels and urns in the kitchen respawn.

The smaller mushroom pods contain a kitchen and an alchemy laboratory. The kitchen has shrines for the three good daedra, and an ashpit with someone's grandpa's bones in in it, because ancestor worship is something that dunmer tend to do. The alchemy lab has, surprisingly, alchemy labs and ingredients.
There's a cook in the kitchen who sells food and drinks, and an alchemist in the lab who sells alchemy stuff; potions, ingredients etc.

There are rooms under the tower now. These rooms contain smithing facilities(anvil, workbench, grindstone) and some beds.
No smelter yet, i will add that in a later update when i have time.

It is located on the southeastern edge of the volcanic tundra, east of Mistwatch. A map marker is visible immediately in game, you don't have to discover it.

There is an essential storm atronach standing guard outside. It will attack any hostiles in the area.


BUGS/ISSUES: None that i know of. If you see any, report the so i can squish them.



I am always open for new suggestions and ideas for improving the tower. :)
author: PaskaAnkka

files.name: Tel Sadrith
files.changelogHtml:
1. Fixed the navmesh. Mostly anyway. Followers still can't follow you into the tower.

2. Modified the interiors. The kitchen has a shrine now, the tower has more lanterns, bookshelves and a huge metal cage with a vampire in it, because vampires are cool. The alchemy lab has a bookshelf.

3. Changed the awkward looking platform by the tower's door into a mushroom cap.

4. Added more roots outside the tower, it looks even more organic now in my opinion.
Tweaked the exterior; added more lanterns, made the tower a bit bigger, some smaller modifications.
Added an essential storm atronach to stand guard outside the tower. It will attack any hostiles in the area.
Added rooms under the tower. These contain smithing facilities and two beds for followers.
